snippet: SHATKIN--Gregory, 51, of California, formerly of Maryland and New Jersey, died suddenly March 25, 2016 while visiting New York City. Greg was the son of the late Joan Shatkin and the late Aaron Shatkin (founding director of the Center for Advanced Biotechnology and Medicine at Rutgers). Visitation will be Saturday, April 16th from 4 to 7pm at Memorial Funeral Home, 155 South Ave., Fanwood, NJ. A service will follow on Sunday, April 17th at 11am at the funeral home. To make a gift in Greg's memory to the Bowdoin College Shatkin Scholarship Fund please contact: bowdoinfund@gmail.com. For the complete obituary or to sign the guestbook, visit www.fanwoodmemorial. com. 1/3
